description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy uses his Gear Second enhanced punch against Dragon Number Thirteen, though the dragon's hard scales minimize the damage.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Used in an attempt to damage Dragon Number Thirteen during the battle on the Burning Lands.
